Selected quantity. By default = 1

Remarks

CheckRequirements(out MoneyManagementResult?, double, bool, bool, bool, bool)

A set of checks to be sure the money management is ready to calculate

protected bool CheckRequirements(out MoneyManagementResult? res, double price, bool checkAccountIsSet = true, bool checkInstrumentIsSet = true, bool checkBrokerageProviderAvailable = true, bool checkAccountIsConnected = false)
